Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Vincennes, 71st, Wentworth, and 69th due to, a fire near 69th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Vincennes, 71st, Wentworth, and 69th due to, a fire near 69th/Lafayette.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cicero.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
